title: Drawing, "Design for a clock", 1800–25
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, red watercolor, on cream laid paper
markings: Lower right: Cooper Union stamp # 457 D
inscribed: Lower center, pen and brown ink: le genie couronnant la poesie 77 / E.p.i.f. aild.|ravd d99
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Base of clock supported by tapered feet. Octagonal base decorated with elongated leaf design and bow. Wreaths at either end. On top of clock case, a bust of Homer. A genius, at right, holds a wreath above the bust.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a clock", 1800–25.
1800–25. Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, red watercolor, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-71-12.
